fields.author: Ethan Sherwood StraussESPN Staff Writer
fields.title: Warriors score 45 in opening quarter, sweep Trail Blazers
fields.description: Golden State used a 45-point first quarter to put a series-clinching Game 4 out of reach in Portland.

fields.title: Norman Powell storming through the postseason for Raptors
fields.description: The Raptors guard came up with his best performance of the season and moved his team within one win of clinching a series he has starred in.

fields.author: David SchoenfieldESPN Senior Writer
fields.title: Real or not? Orioles-Red Sox rivalry heats up; Rockies team to beat in NL
fields.description: The Baltimore-Boston beef is providing the best theater of 2017, while the Rockies' Mark Reynolds is starting to resemble Mike Trout.

fields.title: 2017 NFL draft predictions for all 32 teams
fields.description: Patriots corner Malcolm Butler on the move? Running back Dalvin Cook and quarterback Deshaun Watson to ... ? NFL Nation reporters offer up draft predictions for every team.

fields.author: Mel Kiper Jr.Football analyst
fields.title: Kiper builds Browns' perfect draft: Mocking all 11 picks
fields.description: With 11 total picks, including five in the top 65, Cleveland has a chance to kick its roster rebuild into overdrive. That's where Mel Kiper comes in. He goes through all 11 to build an A+ draft.

fields.author: Todd McShayESPN Senior Writer
fields.title: McShay's draft buzz: Everything I'm hearing
fields.description: Is Myles Garrett still the favorite to go No. 1 overall? Where could Christian McCaffrey land? Todd McShay details the latest from his sources inside the league as the NFL draft approaches.

fields.author: Buster OlneyESPN Senior Writer
fields.title: Olney: Red Sox deserve all the blame for Machado incident
fields.description: Baltimore did everything right as things escalated from unfortunate to ridiculous and dangerous, so MLB was correct to discipline only Boston.

fields.title: College football's best (and worst) NFL factories
fields.description: Ever wonder which college programs produce the best NFL running backs? How about the most long-term starters or the most Pro Bowlers? We dug through data from the past 15 drafts to find out which schools make the grade at the next level.

fields.author: Kevin SeifertNFL Nation
fields.title: Here's what Jabrill Peppers' positive drug test means
fields.description: What does it mean to have a dilute urine sample? Does he enter the NFL's drug program? Is it coincidental or unintentional? Kevin Seifert has answers.

fields.author: Henry AbbottTrueHoop, NBA
fields.title: Is LeBron slowing down?
fields.description: At 32 years old, LeBron James remains superhuman, able to carry the Cavs while playing an unprecedented number of minutes. But even superhumans have their limits.
